welcome.title: Welcome to Caroster!
welcome.text: Would you like to take a feature tour?

creator.step1: Add a new car by clicking on this button.
creator.step2: The waiting list includes passengers who do not yet have a seat in a car.
creator.step3: The event information can be modified from this menu.
creator.step4: The event can be edited by clicking on the edit button.
creator.step5: You can copy the link from now on to share it via email, whatsapp, telegram, etc.

user.step1: Add a new car by clicking on this button.
user.step2: Would you like a place in a car? Register on the waiting list or directly in a car.
user.step3: The event information can be accessed from this menu.
user.step4: You can copy the link from now on to share it via email, whatsapp, telegram, etc.
